response.original_title: Rock House: Advanced Metal - Riffs, Arpeggios & Speed Runs
response.overview: If you've had enough of performing air guitar, here's your chance to learn how to play the real thing like a pro. This in-depth instructional program covers everything you need to know to improve your skills as a heavy metal guitarist. The tutorial focuses on advanced techniques such as whammy bar tricks, rakes, harmonics, full-neck and metal speed runs and much more.
response.title: Rock House: Advanced Metal - Riffs, Arpeggios & Speed Runs
